channel.title: Ankush Patel
channel.description: Ankush Patel is a proficient ML engineer, dedicated to crafting scalable and engaging machine learning applications. With a robust academic foundation and extensive professional experience, he possesses strong programming skills, adept team collaboration abilities, and entrepreneurial acumen.

item.title: Release of Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog v2.0
item.description: Release of Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog template v2.0, refactored with Nextjs App directory and React Server Components setup.Discover the new features and how to migrate from V1.
item.author: ap@ankushp.com (Ankush Patel)

item.title: Introducing Multi-part Posts with Nested Routing
item.description: The blog template supports posts in nested sub-folders. This can be used to group posts of similar content e.g. a multi-part course. This post is itself an example of a nested route!
item.author: ap@ankushp.com (Ankush Patel)
